markdownRemark.html:
Vehicle Model Comparison

Kia Test App

My aim is just to show the fundamental process by combining frontend, backend, and database communication.

Youtube Link: Working Project on Local Host https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Pezcnm82YM&feature=youtu.be

Bootstrap: Styling

Express: Backend

Node.js:EJS Web Template

Images from car companies websites

Sql Queries

router.get(â€˜/getcompetitors/:idâ€™, (req, res) => { var sql = â€˜SELECT * from competitors WHERE competitors.vehicle_model=â€™+â€â€™â€œ+req.params.id+â€â€™â€; db2.query(sql, (err, result) => { if(err) throw err; console.log(result); res.send(result); }); });

router.get(â€˜/createjoinâ€™, (req, res) => { var sql = â€œSELECT vehicles.vehicletype, vehicles.vehiclemodel,vehicles.soldkiamodel,countries.countryname FROM countries JOIN vehicles ON countries.countryname = vehicles.countryname ORDER BY vehicles.countrynameâ€; db2.query(sql, (err, result) => { if(err) throw err; console.log(result); res.send(result); }); });

!!!!! I have combined the other first 3 brands and their models in the competitor table, normally creating a separate brand with the vehicle model table is a more accurate arrangement. ðŸ’ª
